Ingredients.4: 0.5 cup white sugar, or more to taste

Directions.1: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).

Directions.2: Spray baking sheets with cooking spray.

Directions.3: Whisk egg whites and cream of tartar together in a bowl until foamy.

Directions.4: Gradually whisk sugar into egg white mixture until blended.

Directions.5: Whisk almond extract and flour into egg white mixture until stiff peaks have formed. The egg whites should form a sharp peak that holds its shape when whisk is held straight up.

Directions.6: Fold coconut into egg white mixture until incorporated.

Directions.7: Drop spoonfuls of batter onto prepared baking sheets.

Directions.8: Bake in the preheated oven until just golden brown, 8 to 9 minutes. Cool on baking sheets for about 2 minutes; transfer to wire rack to completely cool.
